casebody.data:
JPG, INC.
v.
DICK BECK PROFESSIONAL MARKETING, INC. No. 530P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. Michael S. Harrell, Raleigh, for JPG, Inc. Jack L. Cozort, R. Bruce Thompson, II, Raleigh, for Dick Beck Professional Marketing

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th day of October 2004 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of December 2004."
